summary: A troubled teen is sent to live with his estranged father, a park ranger. During his time there, he develops an unusual affinity with and passion for the wolves in a local pack.
cast: Spencer Treat Clark|Andrew Wilson|Damian Young|Rachel Korine|Armand Schultz|Nathaniel Brown|Michael Meredith|Cynthia Steele Vance|Bernadette Cuvalo|Rebecca L. Baldwin|Lanna Joffrey|George Joe Smith|Ian Jan Campbell|Zachariah Perry
keywords: written by director|two word title|female cinematographer
title: Druid Peak
